alert.note: Alert for Grant; Morton; Stevens (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 4:38PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Seward, southern Hamilton, Morton, southwestern Kearny, Grant, southwestern Meade, Stevens, Stanton and southern Haskell Counties through 515 PM CDT/415 PM MDT/... At 438 PM CDT/338 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Manter to 8 miles northwest of Moscow to near Hayne. Movement was north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Ulysses and Hickok around 455 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Sublette. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
